00046 /** 
00047  * Utility function to fill the chipstream and pm adjuster portions of
00048  * analysisstream. Allows functions like constructAnalysisStream() and
00049  * constructExpressionAnalysisStream() to share same methods for doing this
00050  * and then just cap with QuantificationMethod.
00051  * 
00052  * @param stream - Stream to be filled in.
00053  * @param layout - Information about layout of probes on chip.
00054  * @param pmSpec - String description of pm adjuster.
00055  * @param chipStreamSpec - Vector of strings describing chipstream modules to be created.
00056  * @param name - Name to be filled in as pm adjusters and chipstream modules are created.
00057  */
00058 void AnalysisStreamFactory::fillInAnalysisStream(AnalysisStream *stream,
00059                                                  ChipLayout &layout,
00060                                                  std::string &pmSpec, 
00061                                                  std::vector<std::string> &chipStreamSpec, 
00062                                                  std::string &name)
00063 {
00064   unsigned int wordIx = 0;
00065   PmAdjuster *adjuster = NULL;
00066   adjuster = m_PmAdjustFac.pmAdjusterForString(pmSpec, layout);
00067   stream->setPmAdjuster(adjuster);
00068 
00069   for(wordIx = 0; wordIx < chipStreamSpec.size(); wordIx++) {
00070     ChipStream *trans = m_CsFac.chipStreamForString(chipStreamSpec[wordIx], layout, name);
00071     stream->addChipStream(trans);
00072     name += trans->getType();
00073     name += ".";
00074   }
00075   name += adjuster->getType();
00076 }
00077 
00078 void AnalysisStreamFactory::fillInAnalysisStages(AnalysisStream *stream,
00079                                                  ChipLayout &layout,
00080                                                  const std::string &pmSpec, 
00081                                                  std::vector<std::string> &chipStreamSpec, 
00082                                                  std::string &name)
00083 {
00084   unsigned int wordIx = 0;
00085   PmAdjuster *adjuster = NULL;
00086   adjuster = m_PmAdjustFac.pmAdjusterForString(pmSpec, layout);
00087   stream->setPmAdjuster(adjuster);
00088 
00089   for(wordIx = 0; wordIx < chipStreamSpec.size(); wordIx++) {
00090     ChipStream *trans = m_CsFac.chipStreamForString(chipStreamSpec[wordIx], layout, name);
00091     ChipStreamDataTransform *csStage = new ChipStreamDataTransform(trans);
00092     stream->m_CSStages.push_back(csStage);
00093     name += trans->getType();
00094     name += ".";
00095   }
00096 }

00100                                                                          ChipLayout &layout)

00104     ChipStreamDataTransform *csStage = new ChipStreamDataTransform(trans);
00105     return csStage;

00109 /** 
00110  * @brief Factory for created AnalysisStreams from a string description
00111  * 
00112  * @param s - String description.
00113  * @param layout - Probe and probe set info.
00114  * @param stdMethods - Aliases for standard methods like RMA.
00115  *
00116  * @return analysis stream requested.
00117  */
00118 AnalysisStream *AnalysisStreamFactory::constructAnalysisStream(const std::string& s, ChipLayout &layout, 
00119                                                                std::map<std::string,std::string> &stdMethods,
00120                                                                std::string analysisName) {
00121   assert(s!="");
00122   string description;
00123   bool doingStdMethod = false;
00124   vector<string> words;
00125   string name;
00126   QuantMethod *qMethod = NULL;
00127   AnalysisStream *stream = new AnalysisStream();
00128   
00129   /* Check for one of our std methods. */
00130   if(stdMethods.find(s) != stdMethods.end()) {
00131     doingStdMethod = true;
00132     description = stdMethods[s];
00133   }
00134   else
00135     description = s;
00136 
00137   Util::chopString(description, ',', words);
00138   if(words.size() < 2) {
00139     Err::errAbort("Must specify at least a pm adjustment and summary type.");
00140   }
00141   vector<string> chipStreamSpec(words.begin(), words.end() - 2);
00142   fillInAnalysisStream(stream, layout, words[words.size() -2], chipStreamSpec, name);
00143   /* Set the quantification method. */
00144   qMethod = m_QuantMethFac.quantMethodForString(words[words.size() - 1], layout, m_QuantType);
00145   stream->setQuantMethod(qMethod);
00146   name += ".";
00147   name += qMethod->getType();
00148   stream->setName(name);
00149   /* Make sure we use the alias name for user's sanity. */
00150   if(doingStdMethod)
00151     stream->setName(s);
00152   if(analysisName != "")
00153     stream->setName(analysisName);
00154   return stream;
00155 }
00156 
00157 AnalysisStreamExpression *
00158 AnalysisStreamFactory::tryToMakeAnalysisStream(const std::string &spec) {
00159   string s = spec;
00160   AnalysisStreamExpression *stream = NULL;
00161   SelfCreate *create = NULL;
00162   create = SelfCreate::selfCreateFromString(s, m_Docs, m_Creators, "AnalysisStreamExpression", false);
00163   if(create != NULL) {
00164     if(InstanceOf(create, AnalysisStreamExpression)) {
00165       stream = static_cast<AnalysisStreamExpression *>(create);
00166     }
00167     else {
00168       Err::errAbort("Class doesn't appear to be of type AnalysisStreamExpression.");
00169     }
00170   }
00171   return stream;
00172 }

00174 /** 
00175  * @brief Factory for creatng mRNA expression AnalysisStream from a string description.
00176  * 
00177  * @param s - String description.
00178  * @param layout - Probe and probe set info.
00179  * @param stdMethods - Aliases for standard methods like RMA.
00180  *
00181  * @return analysis stream requested.
00182  */
00183 AnalysisStreamExpression *
00184 AnalysisStreamFactory::constructExpressionAnalysisStream(const std::string& s, ChipLayout &layout, 
00185                                                          std::map<std::string,std::string> &stdMethods,
00186                                                          std::string analysisName) {
00187   assert(s!="");
00188   string description;
00189   bool doingStdMethod = false;
00190   vector<string> words;
00191   string name;
00192   bool appendName = false;
00193   QuantExprMethod *qeMethod = NULL;
00194   //  AnalysisStreamExpression *stream = new AnalysisStreamExpression();
00195   AnalysisStreamExpression *stream = NULL;
00196   
00197   /* Check for one of our std methods. */
00198   if(stdMethods.find(s) != stdMethods.end()) {
00199     doingStdMethod = true;
00200     description = stdMethods[s];
00201   }
00202   else
00203     description = s;
00204 
00205   Util::chopString(description, ',', words);
00206   if(words.size() < 2) {
00207     Err::errAbort("Must specify at least a pm adjustment and summary type.");
00208   }
00209   vector<string>::reverse_iterator rIter = words.rbegin();
00210   stream = tryToMakeAnalysisStream(*rIter);
00211   if(stream != NULL) {
00212     words.pop_back();
00213     appendName = true;
00214   }
00215   else {
00216     stream = new AnalysisStreamExpression();
00217   }
00218   vector<string> chipStreamSpec(words.begin(), words.end() - 2);
00219   fillInAnalysisStream(stream, layout, words[words.size() -2], chipStreamSpec, name);
00220 
00221   /* Set the quantification method. */
00222   qeMethod = m_QuantMethFac.quantExprMethodForString(words[words.size() - 1], layout, m_QuantType);
00223   stream->setQuantMethod(qeMethod);
00224   name += ".";
00225   name += qeMethod->getType();
00226   if(appendName) {
00227     name += ".";
00228     name += stream->getDocName();
00229   }
00230   stream->setName(name);
00231   /* Make sure we use the alias name for user's sanity. */
00232   if(doingStdMethod)
00233     stream->setName(s);
00234   if(analysisName != "")
00235     stream->setName(analysisName);
00236 
00237   // Setup a separate chip stream for getting probe intensities 
00238   // when doing PCA select -- ie do not use the user specified chip stream
00239   if(InstanceOf(stream,AnalysisStreamExpPcaSel)) {
00240     AnalysisStreamExpPcaSel *pcaStream = static_cast<AnalysisStreamExpPcaSel *>(stream);
00241     string name = stream->getName() + ".self-qnorm";
00242     string qSpec = "quant-norm.sketch=" + ToStr(m_CsFac.getTargetSketchSize());
00243     ChipStream *cstream = m_CsFac.chipStreamForString(qSpec, layout, name);
00244     SketchQuantNormTran *qnorm = dynamic_cast<SketchQuantNormTran *>(cstream);
00245     pcaStream->setQuantNorm(qnorm);
00246   }
00247 
00248   return stream;
00249 }

00251 /** 
00252  * @brief Factory for creatng mRNA expression AnalysisStream from a string description.
00253  * 
00254  * @param s - String description.
00255  * @param layout - Probe and probe set info.
00256  * @param stdMethods - Aliases for standard methods like RMA.
00257  *
00258  * @return analysis stream requested.
00259  */
00260 AnalysisStreamExpression *
00261 AnalysisStreamFactory::constructExpressionAnalysisStages(const std::string& s, ChipLayout &layout, 
00262                                                          std::map<std::string,std::string> &stdMethods,
00263                                                          std::string analysisName) {
00264   assert(s!="");
00265   string description;
00266   bool doingStdMethod = false;
00267   vector<string> words;
00268   string name;
00269   bool appendName = false;
00270   QuantExprMethod *qeMethod = NULL;
00271   AnalysisStreamExpression *stream = NULL;
00272   
00273   /* Check for one of our std methods. */
00274   if(stdMethods.find(s) != stdMethods.end()) {
00275     doingStdMethod = true;
00276     description = stdMethods[s];
00277   }
00278   else
00279     description = s;
00280 
00281   Util::chopString(description, ',', words);
00282   if(words.size() < 2) {
00283     Err::errAbort("Must specify at least a pm adjustment and summary type.");
00284   }
00285 
00286   /* See if there are parameters for a special type of AnalysisStream, 
00287      otherwise make a basic version */
00288   vector<string>::reverse_iterator rIter = words.rbegin();
00289   stream = tryToMakeAnalysisStream(*rIter);
00290   if(stream != NULL) {
00291     words.pop_back();
00292     appendName = true;
00293   }
00294   else {
00295     stream = new AnalysisStreamExpression();
00296   }
00297 
00298   vector<string> chipStreamSpec(words.begin(), words.end() - 2);
00299   fillInAnalysisStages(stream, layout, words[words.size() - 2], chipStreamSpec, name);
00300 
00301   /* Set the quantification method. */
00302   qeMethod = m_QuantMethFac.quantExprMethodForString(words[words.size() - 1], layout, m_QuantType);
00303   stream->setQuantMethod(qeMethod);
00304   name += ".";
00305   name += qeMethod->getType();
00306   if(appendName) {
00307     name += ".";
00308     name += stream->getDocName();
00309   }
00310   stream->setName(name);
00311   /* Make sure we use the alias name for user's sanity. */
00312   if(doingStdMethod)
00313     stream->setName(s);
00314   if(analysisName != "")
00315     stream->setName(analysisName);
00316 
00317   // Setup a separate chip stream for getting probe intensities 
00318   // when doing PCA select -- ie do not use the user specified chip stream
00319   if(InstanceOf(stream,AnalysisStreamExpPcaSel)) {
00320     AnalysisStreamExpPcaSel *pcaStream = static_cast<AnalysisStreamExpPcaSel *>(stream);
00321     string name = stream->getName() + ".self-qnorm";
00322     ChipStream *cstream = m_CsFac.chipStreamForString("quant-norm.sketch=-1", layout, name);
00323     SketchQuantNormTran *qnorm = dynamic_cast<SketchQuantNormTran *>(cstream);
00324     pcaStream->setQuantNorm(qnorm);
00325   }
00326 
00327   return stream;
00328 }

00330 /** 
00331  * @brief Factory for creatng Genotype SNP chip AnalysisStream from a string description.
00332  * 
00333  * @param s - String description.
00334  * @param layout - Probe and probe set info.
00335  * @param stdMethods - Aliases for standard methods like RMA.
00336  *
00337  * @return analysis stream requested.
00338  */
00339 AnalysisStreamGType *
00340 AnalysisStreamFactory::constructGTypeAnalysisStream(const std::string& s, ChipLayout &layout, 
00341                                                     std::map<std::string,std::string> &stdMethods,
00342                                                     std::string analysisName) {
00343   assert(s!="");
00344   string description;
00345   bool doingStdMethod = false;
00346   vector<string> words;
00347   string name;
00348   
00349   QuantGTypeMethod *gtMethod = NULL;
00350   AnalysisStreamGType *stream = new AnalysisStreamGType();
00351   
00352   /* Check for one of our std methods. */
00353   if(stdMethods.find(s) != stdMethods.end()) {
00354     doingStdMethod = true;
00355     description = stdMethods[s];
00356   }
00357   else
00358     description = s;
00359 
00360   Util::chopString(description, ',', words);
00361   if(words.size() < 2) {
00362     Err::errAbort("Must specify at least a pm adjustment and summary type.");
00363   }
00364   vector<string> chipStreamSpec(words.begin(), words.end() - 2);
00365   fillInAnalysisStream(stream, layout, words[words.size() -2], chipStreamSpec, name);
00366 
00367   /* Set the quantification method. */
00368   gtMethod = m_QuantMethFac.quantGTypeMethodForString(words[words.size() - 1], layout, m_QuantType);
00369   stream->setQuantMethod(gtMethod);
00370   name += ".";
00371   name += gtMethod->getType();
00372   stream->setName(name);
00373   /* Make sure we use the alias name for user's sanity. */
00374   if(doingStdMethod)
00375     stream->setName(s);
00376   if(analysisName != "")
00377     stream->setName(analysisName);
00378   return stream;
00379 }

00381 /** 
00382  * @brief Load up a list of probes from a .bgp file
00383  * 
00384  * @param fileName - name of bgp file.
00385  * @param controlProbes - vector to be filled in with probes.
00386  */
00387 void AnalysisStreamFactory::probeListFromBgpFile(const std::string& fileName, vector<Probe *> &controlProbes) {
00388 
00389   affx::BgpFile bgp;
00390   if (bgp.open(fileName)!=TSV_OK) {
00391     Err::errAbort("Unable to open "+ToStr(fileName));
00392   }
00393   
00394   while (bgp.next_bgprobe()==TSV_OK) {
00395     Probe *p = new Probe();
00396     p->id=bgp.probe_id-1; // NOTE: -1 because this probe_id is 1-based.
00397     controlProbes.push_back(p);
00398   }
00399   bgp.close();
00400 }

00402 void AnalysisStreamFactory::setupAnalysisStreamFactory(
00403         AnalysisStreamFactory &asFactory,
00404         affx::File5_File * inputFile,
00405         affx::File5_Group * inputGroup,
00406         affx::File5_File * outputFile,
00407         affx::File5_Group * outputGroup,
00408         uint32_t celFileCount,
00409         uint32_t probeCount,
00410         const std::string &outDir,
00411         bool writeSketch,
00412         const std::string &targetSketch,
00413         bool writeProfile,
00414         const std::string &referenceProfile,
00415         bool a5Sketch,
00416         bool a5SketchUseGlobal,
00417         bool a5SketchInputGlobal,
00418         const std::string &a5SketchInputFile,
00419         const std::string &a5SketchInputName,
00420         const std::string &a5SketchInputGroup,
00421         const std::string &useFeatEff,
00422         bool a5FeatureEffectsInputGlobal,
00423         const std::string &a5FeatureEffectsInputFile,
00424         const std::string &a5FeatureEffectsInputName,
00425         const std::string &a5FeatureEffectsInputGroup,
00426         const std::string &a5InputGroup,
00427         const std::string &a5Group,
00428         const std::string &setAnalysisName,
00429         const std::string &quantMethodSpec,
00430         const std::string &bgpFile,
00431         const std::string &AnnotFile,
00432         const ChipLayout &layout
00433      ) {
00434   asFactory.setCelFileCount(celFileCount);
00435   if(writeSketch) {
00436     asFactory.setWriteSketchDir(outDir + Fs::osPathSep());
00437   } else if (a5Sketch) {
00438     if (a5SketchUseGlobal) {
00439         if(outputGroup == NULL)
00440             Err::errAbort("--a5-sketch-use-global option given, but no global file. Must specify --a5-global-file.");
00441         asFactory.setWriteSketchGroup_a5(outputGroup);
00442     }
00443     else {
00444       asFactory.setWriteSketchDir_a5(outDir + Fs::osPathSep());
00445     }
00446   }
00447 
00448   if (writeProfile){
00449       asFactory.setWriteProfileDir(outDir + Fs::osPathSep());
00450   }
00451   //
00452   if (targetSketch != "") {
00453     Verbose::out(1, "Opening target normalization file: " + Fs::basename(targetSketch));
00454     asFactory.readTargetSketchFromFile(targetSketch);
00455   } else if(a5SketchInputGlobal || a5SketchInputFile!=""){
00456       string groupName = "/";
00457       string dataName = "target-sketch";
00458       if(a5SketchInputName != "") 
00459         dataName = a5SketchInputName;
00460       if(a5SketchInputGroup != "") 
00461         groupName = a5SketchInputGroup;
00462       else if(a5InputGroup != "") 
00463         groupName = a5InputGroup;
00464       else if(a5Group != "") 
00465         groupName = a5Group;
00466 
00467       if (a5SketchInputGlobal) {
00468           Verbose::out(1,"Loading sketch from global A5 file, group '" + groupName + "', data '" + dataName + "'");
00469           if(inputFile == NULL)
00470             Err::errAbort("--a5-sketch-input-global option given, but no global input file. Must specify --a5-global-file.");
00471           affx::File5_Group *a5group = inputFile->openGroup(groupName,affx::FILE5_OPEN_RO);
00472           asFactory.readTargetSketchFromFile_a5_tsv(a5group, dataName);
00473           a5group->close();
00474           Freez(a5group);
00475       } else if (a5SketchInputFile!="") {
00476           Verbose::out(1,"Loading sketch from '" + a5SketchInputFile + "' A5 file, group '" + groupName + "', data '" + dataName + "'");
00477           affx::File5_File  *a5file = new affx::File5_File();
00478           a5file->open(a5SketchInputFile,affx::FILE5_OPEN_RO);
00479           affx::File5_Group *a5group = a5file->openGroup(groupName,affx::FILE5_OPEN_RO);
00480           asFactory.readTargetSketchFromFile_a5_tsv(a5group, dataName);
00481           a5group->close();
00482           Freez(a5group);
00483           a5file->close();
00484           Freez(a5file);
00485       }
00486 
00487   }
00488 
00489         // the factory needs to know the file name so it can pass it to the created objects
00490   if (referenceProfile !=""){
00491           asFactory.setreadReferenceProfile(referenceProfile);
00492 }
00493 
00494   if(bgpFile!="") {
00495     asFactory.readControlProbes(bgpFile);
00496   }
00497   if (AnnotFile != "") {
00498     asFactory.setAnnotationFileName(AnnotFile);
00499   }
00500 
00501   QuantMethodFactory::setupQuantMethodFactory(
00502         asFactory.m_QuantMethFac,
00503         inputFile,
00504         inputGroup,
00505         outputFile,
00506         outputGroup,
00507         probeCount,
00508         outDir,
00509         useFeatEff,
00510         a5FeatureEffectsInputGlobal,
00511         a5FeatureEffectsInputFile,
00512         a5FeatureEffectsInputName,
00513         a5FeatureEffectsInputGroup,
00514         a5InputGroup,
00515         a5Group,
00516         setAnalysisName,
00517         quantMethodSpec,
00518         layout
00519   );
00520 }
